title: Lynda - Up and Running with ECMAScript 6
description:
Lynda - Up and Running with ECMAScript 6

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

1h 18m Beginner Jan 05, 2016   | Uploaded in Jan 15, 2016 by 2boweb

Subject:  Web 
Software:  JavaScript 
Author:  Eve Porcello 

Meet the future of JavaScript: ECMAScript 6. This short course takes a look at the latest features of ECMAScript 6 (aka ES6) and how these changes are making JavaScript even more powerful and concise. Eve Porcello reviews the new keywords and function/object syntax and shows how the new class syntax can be used with React, the popular JavaScript library. You'll also review the ES6 compiling tool Babel, and use Babel to make your ES6 code compatible with modern browsers.
Topics include:
	â€¢	What is ECMAScript?
	â€¢	Transpiling ECMAScript with Babel and Babel-node
	â€¢	Using the let and const keywords
	â€¢	Creating strings with template strings
	â€¢	Enhancing object literals
	â€¢	Working with ES6 classes and class inheritance
